What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?

Developing Countries are playing a vital role when we speak about Economy as such.Economy when we speak is nothing but DEMAND and SUPPLY.Any countries economy depends upon the citizens purchasing power in the country.

After Globalization happenned in early 1990's market became open and countries are generally classified into DEVELOPED,DEVELOPING and UNDEVELOPED Countries.

Developed Countries economy has come to saturation and now world is focussing on Developing Countries as the scope of growth and investment opportunities are huge.So inorder to meet demand of human beings staying in that partiular country many companies are seeing scope of business available in the specific market and started investing huge amounts by which money started rotating across globe.

Thus the role when we speak now in specific is  that developing countries are giving many investors scope of investement thus by which both investors are able to pump money into markets and earn profits simeltaneosly creating employment for many unemployed youth and people of the country simeltaneoulsy are able to satisfy their needs thus giving satisfication to the respective individual.As we have come across a word called CITARIUS PARIBUS-meaning people spending on the name of PRESTIGE,many esteemed companies in different countries are able to make profits by doing business with developing countries.This not only has given business scope to companies but could also generate revenue to respective country and could make developing countries to compete with Technology as even local companies are upgrading their skills at par with other MNC Comapnies,thus creating brilliant minds at Developing Countries.

Not only that the money generated in developing countries is rotated across globe thus by which Liquid Cash is growing pan World thus making many countries and people rich.

Thus i would conclude saying that Developing Countries have become a key role in Economy Growth as there are  lot of opportunities available.
